long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Quickly and easily generate QR codes.

Instant QR Code Generator allows you to easily generate QR codes. 

Features:
-Automatically generates a QR code for the current page when the extension's icon is clicked
-Print QR codes
-Bulk generate QR codes

This extension is completely free and does not collect any data.

Please review and rate this extension.
Any feedback or suggestions can also be emailed to youthmolecule@gmail.com.
